titleStmt.title: The history of Father La Chaise, Jesuite, and confessor to Lewis XIV, present King of France discovering, the secret intreagues by him carried on, as well in the court of England, as in all the courts of Europe, to advance the great designs of the King his master / made English from the French original.
Histoire du père La Chaize, jésuite et confesseur du roi Louis XIV. English.
titleStmt.author: Le Noble, Eustache, 1643-1711.
Le Noble, Pierre.
Le Roux, Philibert-Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Wilde, for H. Rhodes ...,

notesStmt.note: Wing attributes this to Eustache Le Noble, although there is no evidence for this in BM, NUC pre-1956, or BN. NUC notes attribution to P.J. Leroux and P. Le Noble.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
